title: Voice Cloner
description: Clone any voice through three input modes: URL (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram), file upload, or microphone recording using advanced AI voice synthesis.
longDescription: An advanced voice cloning application that supports multiple input methods. Clone voices from social media URLs (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram), upload audio files directly, or record through your microphone. Uses Dia TTS technology for high-quality voice synthesis with real-time processing and cloud deployment capabilities.
highlights: Three input modes: URL, file upload, microphone
Support for YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram URLs
Real-time voice cloning with Dia TTS
Responsive web interface built with HTMX
Docker deployment ready for cloud (Google Cloud Run)

title: Samfundet Medlemskort
description: Create, crop, and print membership card photos with exact dimensions. Upload a photo, crop to the required ratio, and export a ready‑to‑print A4 sheet or PDF.
longDescription: A specialized tool for creating membership card photos with precise 25mm × 30mm dimensions. Features drag & drop upload, enforced 2.5:3 crop ratio, live print preview with cutting guidelines, and one-click PDF export.
highlights: Exact sizing: 25mm × 30mm per photo on A4
Drag & drop upload with enforced crop ratio
Live print preview with precise mm sizing
One-click PDF export functionality
Accessible, responsive UI with light/dark theme

title: Merch-Whiz
description: Effortless Print-on-Demand Merchandise Creation. Design and order custom merchandise like t-shirts, hoodies, and mugs with ease.
longDescription: A user-friendly platform that empowers anyone to design and order custom merchandise. No design skills needed! Features secure authentication, product catalog, intuitive design creation, order management, and planned automated fulfillment.
highlights: User authentication with Google OAuth
Intuitive design creation with product previews
Product catalog with t-shirts, hoodies, mugs
End-to-end typesafe APIs with tRPC
Planned integration with Gelato API and Stripe

title: Developer Portfolio
description: This very portfolio website built with modern technologies and beautiful animations.
longDescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Features beautiful animations, bento grid layout, dark theme, and optimized performance.
highlights: Beautiful bento grid layout
Smooth animations with Framer Motion
Responsive design with modern UI
TypeScript for type safety
Optimized performance and SEO
